channel.title: Getting Started on Intro to R for Academic Researchers
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Intro to R for Academic Researchers

item.title: Software
item.description: R - Windows or Mac RStudio - Download Windows or Mac version from here LaTeX - Windows use MiKTeX or Mac use BasicTeX If using Windows, you also need to download and install these: RTools ActivePerl

item.title: Resources
item.description: Textbooks Wickham, H., & Grolemund, G. (2016) R for Data Science. O’Reilly. Most of this books is available freely online at r4ds.had.co.nz/ but can be purchased from Amazon. Wickham, H. (2014) Advanced R. Baca Raton, FL: Taylor & Francis Group. Most of this book is available freely online at adv-r.had.co.nz but can be purchased from Amazon. James, G., Witten, D., Hastie, T., & Tibshirani, R. (2013).
